headline: Is Trending Stock Hologic, Inc. (HOLX) a Buy Now?

headline: Bruker: Former Academia Customer Strength, Now Incredible Weakness
summary: Bruker faces challenges amid NIH funding cuts and academic reliance. Short-term risks are high, but investors may benefit from a recovery. See more on BRKR.
